about_the_game:
Delusion is a First Person Survival Horror Experience where you play as a construction worker Derek Muller who after an accident wakes up trapped inside The Asylum on lockdown with no idea of leaving it whatsoever.



SYNOPSIS



Equipped with nothing but your only friend and guide your trustee lighter, Your task is to explore and find a way out of the Asylum with all Hell Broke loose. Survive the nightmarish inmates of the Asylum and uncover their nastiest secrets. Its an ultimate test of Survival between the predators and the prey where all odds are stacked against you. Stay hidden from the nightmares that lurk within and keep crawling.

Will you make it to the end and uncover a Dark Truth or will you DIE trying??

Find all your nightmares in Delusion and dare to keep moving forwards.
We wish you a very.....Good Luck

FEATURES:



  • A Nightmarish Horror Experience that will keep you on edge throughout the entire journey with creatures that you can only hide from.
  • A trustee lighter that can be used as a guide and also is your only source of light in the Asylum.
  • Nightmarish Secrets can be uncovered throughout your journey that helps you in grasping the plot.
  • Unpredictable enemies can get a drop on you no matter wherever you are.

name: Delusion

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 3500
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1660 super
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: some system requirements might change in future.

short_description: With all the nightmarish creatures on loose, Find your way out of the Asylum and uncover a grisly truth in the end in this First Person Nightmarish Horror. Play as Derek Muller a construction worker trying to find a way out only for him to find all his nightmares come to life..
